title: get tickets by user role with pagination
description: Verify that the GET /api/tickets endpoint returns tickets filtered by user role and supports pagination parameters such as page and limit.

title: create a new ticket
description: Test the POST /api/tickets endpoint to ensure a new ticket can be created with valid fields including title, description, priority, type, and department_id, and that the ticket is stored with correct metadata.

title: get ticket by id
description: Validate the GET /api/tickets/{id} endpoint to retrieve a ticket by its ID, ensuring correct ticket details are returned and proper error handling for invalid or non-existent IDs.

title: user login with active directory authentication
description: Test the POST /api/login endpoint to verify user authentication against Active Directory credentials, session creation, and role-based authorization.

title: get sla configurations
description: Verify the GET /api/sla-configurations endpoint returns the list of SLA configurations with correct details including priorities, response times, and business hours.

title: create sla configuration
description: Test the POST /api/sla-configurations endpoint to create a new SLA configuration with valid input and ensure it is stored and applied correctly.

title: get departments
description: Validate the GET /api/departments endpoint to retrieve the list of departments with their configurations.

title: create department
description: Test the POST /api/departments endpoint to create a new department with valid data and verify it is stored correctly.

title: upload attachment
description: Verify the POST /api/attachments endpoint supports file upload via multipart/form-data, stores the file securely in AWS S3, and links metadata correctly to the ticket and user.

title: get ticket reports with date filters
description: Test the GET /api/reports/tickets endpoint to generate ticket reports filtered by startDate and endDate, ensuring accurate data and correct filtering.
